content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you like the apartment. The rental price is negotiable. Let's start with an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good start. I am a student and I am looking for an affordable apartment. I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month including all the costs.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low offer, Mr. Abbasi. I am sure you understand that this is a newly built apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. I suggest 800 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but I still think that 500 Euro is a fair price for this apartment. I am a student and I don't have a high budget. I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month including all the costs.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but 600 Euro is still far below the value of the apartment. I understand that you are a student, but I am also a businessman who needs to make a profit. I suggest 750 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can understand that you need to make a profit. However, I am trying to find an apartment that fits into my budget. I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month including all the costs.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 650 Euro is still not acceptable. I understand your budget constraints, but I also have my expenses to consider. I suggest 725 Euro per month. This should be the final negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I really appreciate it. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month including all the costs.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mr. Abbasi. However, 700 Euro is still not enough for me to cover my expenses. I suggest 730 Euro per month. This should be the final negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience. I am willing to pay 720 Euro per month including all the costs.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your patience too, Mr. Abbasi. I agree to the price of 720 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 720 Euro per month. Let's continue with the contract process.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Great, Mr. Abbasi. I am looking forward to having you as my tenant. Let's proceed with the contract process.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Is there anything else you need from me before we sign the contract?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Not at the moment, Mr. Abbasi. The contract is ready and just needs your signature. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any questions or concerns. I am ready to sign the contract.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Great, Mr. Abbasi. Please sign the contract and return it to me. I will provide you with a copy of the signed contract.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will sign the contract and return it to you as soon as possible.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to receiving the signed contract. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
